channel.title: How do i make a menu and open it with a command?
channel.description: Someone please help would be really kind of them. to do so please tell me where to add the command and menu? please and in advance thanks yOU!

item.title: How do i make a menu and open it with a command?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Are you looking to open a GUI interface in the Runescape game? If that is the case, I would start looking where the bank menu is implemented and learn from that. You could write your own method, but it would be easier to modify a pre-existing generic menu. For example the one that pops up with text.

All that data is in the client and actually quit easy to understand, if you know basic java Then you could either use an object in the game or one of the buttons on the righthand menu to trigger your menu.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a menu and open it with a command?
